about_the_game:
In a certain kingdom, in a certain state, the darkest evil has awakened and captured the capital castle of the country there. Demons and their minions have penetrated the royal chambers and stolen an ancient amulet, with the help of which the passage to the other worlds is maintained. And the world was practically doomed, if not for the oldest order of Demon Hunters who decided to send a young but promising hero and his mentor named Grandfather to stop the Demons of the Night and finally return peace to the kingdom.

  • Complete quests!

  • Collect treasures!

  • Improve your equipment!

  • Defeat bosses!

  • Complete all the dungeons!


You will find dynamic battles with bandits, pirates, zombies, skeletons and demons, interesting exciting quests, as well as the opportunity to improve your equipment: helmet, armor, weapons, and so on. Under your leadership, the hero will go through the difficult path of a man of honest fate from a simple village boy to a noble knight clad in armor. Or maybe your ward will become a sharp-sighted archer or a young wizard or a beautiful pirate girl. It's up to you to decide!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q8200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT710 2GB GDDR3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Demon Hunters is an exciting RPG game where you control a hero fighting to rid the world of evil and go on a journey through sixteen randomly generated dungeon levels to come face to face with Demons.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
